content:
er 29, 2015
												Расскажу вам свою историю.Играли мы с другом, зашли в электро. Лутаем бар и тут со стороны школы раздался выстрел из M16A2.Друг тут же умер. Сижу жду пока противник придет лутать (тогда я ещё не понял, что выстрел был со школы).Я решил посмотреть в окно и увидел паренька лежашего на крыше. Я его высматривал в течении ~3х минут.Он так же смотрел в мою сторону. На тот момент у меня был только винчестер. Я решил рискнуть и высунулся из окна.Я сделал 1 меткий выстрел в голову и парниша умер. Дальше я сидел и ждал моего друга. Как только он вернулся я пошел лутать того паренька. У него была собственно M16A2 и несколько станажек. Так же у нас была большая проблема с водой.У него как раз было несколько банок газировки. Как только собрали всё нужное, мы двинули в пожарку на окраине города.Там мы поели и попили. У нас всё ещё осталась проблема с водой и мы агрили и убивали зомби. Жили "от банки до банки". После ~10 минут кемпа в пожарке начался дождь. К большому сожалению я заболел, но у нас как раз была одна пачка антибиотиков. Я вылечился и мы вышли с сервера. Как только я вернулся на сервер (Мой друг зашел позже). Когда я вернулся на сервер, у меня по какой то причине было гораздо меньше крови чем при выходе.Я решил не засиживаться и уходить из пожарки так как сервер был фулловый. Как только я зашел за кирпичный завод, я встретил двух вооруженных парней. Они без расспроса открыли по мне огонь, я дал ответку. Тогда я не знал, что эта Мка стреляет одиночными... Я застрелил одного насмерть, ранил второго, но он меня убил. Когда мой друг зашел на сервер он пошел на место моей смерти. Он обнаружил, что там 3 трупа, следственно паренек который убил меня, умер.Я пришел мы забрали лут и пошли выживать дальше.  Всё всегда по кругу. Вы в топ луте? Вы непременно заболеете. Вы в топ луте? Вы непременно проголодаетесь.10/10 Обожаю эту игру.

												800 HOURS ON RECORDUnfortunately this game has no usa player base and was community created, therefore it never was completed and is very buggy. Could of , Should of, Would of been an excellent game.  I personally dived in head first and started my own server. What a mistake that was. Noneless there are already 100+ servers out there empty. Everyone of them added more scripts to their servers, without first fixing the main mod errors that come in their server packs, cr4eating a ton more errors and memory leaks, client and server side, in turn causing tons of lag and people complaining like me.This game goes on sale numerous times of the year for 8 dollars. That is the time to buy it and then only. Don't waste your money otherwise. Make sure you buy the complete collection with all the DLC if you want to be able to join any server. Good Luck and for USA Players, Look me up...  173.30.102.55:2302  Its up most nights of the week. Epoch NAPF Server.P.S. If you are thinking of DayZ Standalone, don't think twice, buy this instead on sale for 8 dollars. The Standalone I do not recommend.I ONLY RECOMMEND THIS GAME BECAUSE ARMA2 ITSELF (without all the dayz bs) IS EXCELLENT AND FOR 8 DOLLARS THE HEADACHE OF DAYZ MOD INCLUDED WAS WORTH 800 HOURS OF NO USA PLAYERS AND BEING SOLO. MAYBE SOMEDAY IT WILL HAVE A USA PLAYER BASE... EVERYONE KEEPS TRYING TO MAKE A GOOD SURVIVAL PVP GAME BUT NOONE IS SUCCEEDING...

content:
0, 2014
												If you are wanting a short review before my rant then i will simply say:Good amounts of content but a frustrating and glitchy pile of junk.Dayz may be a popular mod for arma2 but besides the shear amount of content to choose from you would not know it. Most games with cult followings have fan made patches or fixes to polish out the rough edges and make the game more enjoyable.This is not the case with the dayz mod. The game feels and looks terrible it plays even worse.Animations are poor as are the response times when you press a command key.Example you are in a house when a zombie runs inside and approaches you,you hit a key to draw a weapon only to have it take about 10 seconds all the while the zombie is chomping on your neck.Glitches that should have been fixed by somebody or anybody ruin the immersion and make even simple tasks a nightmare. There is no excuse for a game having been out this long to posses such a myriad of faults and glitches.This is assuming you can even get the game to run for more than 30 minutes before it drops you for no apparent reason. can say with certainty that i have spent more time Patching,Fixing ,Updating and doing general maintenance and troubleshooting problems than actually playing the game.How this mod is so popular i will never know it is a over-complicated pile of junk.

												I walked for 2 hours to meet up with some of my 'friends' on this bridge where we were going to camp out. Upon arriving I was murdered in cold blood by my 'friends' for a can of beans and a bottle of contaminated water. After that I walked for another hour to look for other survivors. The moment I found someone they ran at me and killed me for 3 bullets. This game should be renamed "Kill your friends for beans and hold down W for 2 hours and glitchy as nutz not-so-much-of-a-zombie simulator 2014"   10/10

content:
er 14, 2016
												The mod have gone thrugh another update and what does it adds? Well.. nothing much, beside that the base building has came back to the game, which I'm not a big fan and it kinda destroys the survival concept of the game.. enough of that for a moment and let's get in to the point of this review and say what the game is real about.It's been a while since the game got their rewards and most you you wouldn't look at it again after.. some other games coming out and removing the AS50 (!) from the game.. I feel like the game has rached gold age again with the update from the last month and they still keep on going with these. From the beginning you will see that this review is delivered for those who actually played the game or got it already in the past for long time but I'll try to turn back in time for a little while because that's what it provides and that's what I think is the most immportant that's left in this game. The game throws us in to zombie land of Charnorus -or/and vice versa- speaking about this as a world makes us think that it must be pretty big thing to move around on (walkin simulator?) and.. yes, it's.. an open world game aswell! With a mixture of realistic, simulator based combat system and variety if immportant to a player needs which can be challenging sometimes to keep up with them while you're running away from pursuing enemies; and there is plenty of them! Starting from your needs and health contidion status to end it on a players that are going for the same building as you are in a hope of finding this valuble loot. You could say that the game is made of such a little personal goals that you are seeking in any part of the game and this would be the best way to put it. Just planing your safe route to the city might be the starting point of this and thinking of whatever is needed to get this sniper out from that hill would be another level of challenging goals that you want to chose from and pick them as their own because anyone can chase them doing it from all sorts of level of the map and the game.One of the game that should get a chance from anyone who played in the past but also someone who didn't played it at all because anyone can find themselfs in the game.

content:
ry 7, 2014
												This is my review of the ARMA 2 Mod called DayZ even though the standalone is already out.I'm gonna start the review off with a story.I had spawned next to Electro with a Large Backpack and a M4A1 Red Dot (Server Settings) I went into Electro knowing how dangerous it is and saw a helicopter land on the roof. Sure I could go try to rush the guy and take it but I had a better idea. I waited about 10 minutes and he got back in. I kept asking him in Side Chat if he was friendly and he wasn't responding. So as he took off I shot at him. After about a round of firing at him his engine cut out and the chopper fell to the ground and blew up. He had jumped out and parachuted nearby so I ran out of Electro. I found a Black SUV with full fuel and working near the fire station and got my ♥♥♥ outta there. As I was driving on the road this other Black SUV came out of no where and rammed me. The guy got out of his car and started to shoot me. He missed me but shot the vehicle. I could've gotten out of the car and attempted to murder him but I didn't instead I drove away and he kept shooting. He even shot a grenade launcher at me but missed *Thank God* and as I was driving away. My car blew up and I thought I died but apparently I lived. I was bleeding fast and didn't have a lot of blood so I had to risk blood bagging and bandaging myself behind a tree. and thats what I did. He never came to look for me. He probably thought I died. After getting to the nearest town I met a friendly who gave me a lift to a base he was gonna assault where they had some good gear. We got to their stash of guns and took a few but just as we were leaving we got shot and I never met that friendly again.That my friends is DayZ. A epic, fun, social, and fantastic experience. I've played a lot of this off of Steam for better performance so that's why my hours aren't that high but I gotta say. If you have ARMA 2 and ARMA 2 OA you better download this and try it out because it's a fantastic experience.

												I didn't know what to write for my review so here are some facts about ebola!!!Ebola virus disease (EVD; also Ebola hemorrhagic fever, or EHF), or simply Ebola, is a disease of humans and other primates caused by ebolaviruses. Signs and symptoms typically start between two days and three weeks after contracting the virus with a fever, sore throat, muscular pain, and headaches. Then, vomiting, diarrhea and rash usually follow, along with decreased function of the liver and kidneys. At this time some people begin to bleed both internally and externally. The disease has a high risk of death, killing between 25 and 90 percent of those infected with an average of about 50 percent. This is often due to low blood pressure from fluid loss, and typically follows six to sixteen days after symptoms appear.The virus spreads by direct contact with body fluids, such as blood, of an infected human or other animals. This may also occur through contact with an item recently contaminated with bodily fluids.[1] Spread of the disease through the air between primates, including humans, has not been documented in either laboratory or natural conditions. ♥♥♥♥♥ or breast milk of a person after recovery from EVD may still carry the virus for several weeks to months. Fruit bats are believed to be the normal carrier in nature, able to spread the virus without being affected by it. Other diseases such as malaria, cholera, typhoid fever, meningitis and other viral hemorrhagic fevers may resemble EVD. Blood samples are tested for viral RNA, viral antibodies or for the virus itself to confirm the diagnosis.Control of outbreaks requires coordinated medical services, alongside a certain level of community engagement. The medical services include rapid detection of cases of disease, contact tracing of those who have come into contact with infected individuals, quick access to laboratory services, proper healthcare for those who are infected, and proper disposal of the dead through cremation or burial. Samples of body fluids and tissues from people with the disease should be handled with special caution. Prevention includes limiting the spread of disease from infected animals to humans. This may be done by handling potentially infected bush meat only while wearing protective clothing and by thoroughly cooking it before eating it. It also includes wearing proper protective clothing and washing hands when around a person with the disease.No specific treatment or vaccine for the virus is available, although a number of potential treatments are being studied. Supportive efforts, however, improve outcomes. This includes either oral rehydration therapy (drinking slightly sweetened and salty water) or giving intravenous fluids as well as treating symptoms. The disease was first identified in 1976 in two simultaneous outbreaks, one in Nzara, and the other in Yambuku, a village near the Ebola River from which the disease takes its name. EVD outbreaks occur intermittently in tropical regions of sub-Saharan Africa. Between 1976 and 2013, the World Health Organization reports a total of 24 outbreaks involving 1,716 cases. The largest outbreak is the ongoing epidemic in West Africa centered in Guinea, Sierra Leone and Liberia. As of 11 April 2015, this outbreak has 25,626 reported cases resulting in 10,619 deaths.I R8 A VERY GR8 8/8 PLS DONT H8 AND TRY NOT TO MAKE IT B8 BUT QUICKSCOPING IS MY F8 PEACE OUT GONNA MASTURB8 ON YOUR LAMINATE FLOORING M8!!!!

content:
y 22, 2014
												Absolute garbage, mod or not. Maybe if you're an autist with an ungodly amount of patience you can find enjoyment, but even then I doubt it. For those familiar with ARMA, it's similar in concept, but the execution is terrible. Interface is clunky and unresponsive, zombie AI is laughable as they jitter and zig zag haphazardly and glitch out uncontrollably. Forget words like matchmaking, navigating to a server through the sea of CU$T0M [300+ ITEMS M0D] SERV3RZ is a struggle in itself (Look into DayZ Commander if you're hellbent on a bad time). Clearly any kind of melee system was not anticipated in ARMA, and it reflects itself in Day Z. This is the worst FPS and survival experience I've played to date. Hyper realism is wasted on sluggish controls and a terrible GUI, you won't have time to enjoy bullet trajectory while you're panicked, starving, and hyperventilating from tripping on your own legs. Prepare yourself to wander aimlessly for hours through the "massive scale" in a desolate wasteland trying to figure out the controls (or location) while picking up empty food cans, before you die a hundred frustrating deaths and lose everything-- all the while facing the elistist community. The difficulty lie not in the zombies or players, but in the constant struggle against a buggy, awful game.This isn't difficult in the way Dark Souls or STALKER's Misery Mod is, it's like driving a broken tricyle backwards during a marathon. Even at ultra-low HumbleBundle price, I regret my purchase immensely and I truly misunderstand anyone liking this game.

content:
, 2014
												I have been playing a long time using dayz commander not on steam. It is impossible to get started or even enjoy this game if you are going to be playing by yourself. Get some friends or don't play. (iunless you like running around for hours on end and getting shot and having to run around again.)But here's how it normally goes.You spawn in on the coast with nothing but a pistol and a bandage. You run around for over an hour looking for some gear. Picking up a soda here, a can of beans there. BAM! Some fully geared player just shot you before you could even get a weapon. On your second try you spawn in and run around four another 2 hours and finally find a low level waepon like a lee enfield. You then see someone, get excited and say "hello! are you friendly?" and BAM!. they shoot you and take your gear without a word. This cycle repeats over and over until you realize you just spent 8 hours running and getting shot on sight and running around and getting shot on sight and running around and getting shot and never really accomplishing anything.  EVERYONE shoots on sight in this game. EVERYONE. Unless you have some friends to cover your back this will keep happening to you. It's not a open world survival game... it's a giant free-for-all deathmatch.  I wouldn't reccomend this game to anyone who is planning on playing it by themselves.  You will get frustrated and bored very quicly.

content:
28, 2016
												When you open this game's main menu, you will be bombarded with loud static. Ouch.When I try to connect to a server it crashes. Only after trying a second time will it work.Don't know if this is just me, but I doubt it.The game's default video settings are garbage. The devs expect you to have some sort of super computer to be able to run this. It's horribly optimized. I have a good computer and I had to disable everything.Theres this weird motion blurr effect you will want to disable, too. The game's basically unplayable without doing so.Zombies will target you from miles away. The only way to hope to avoid them is to crawl with z, which is horribly slow and doesn't always work. Once the zombies target you, you will have to run to escape them, which will attract more zombies... they can walk through walls, open doors, climb ladders... there's literally no way to not be killed by a zombie, unless you have a weapon:Items are very scarce and weapons are rare to say the least. You will likely die before finding anything useful. The inventory is hard to navigate, and there is no "action button." Instead, you mouse over the thing you want to pick up (unless you are holding a weapon or your flashlight, there is no crosshair to help you with this) and use the scroll wheel to select what you want to do with it. It's irritating to say the least.The game has a day/night cycle. At night it is literally impossible to do anything.Overall this game is really hard to enjoy. I wanted to like it, but it's almost unplayable.

If this is something you want, definitely buy it, but try to avoid getting Arma 2 and just get OA since you don't really need it.

												Psychopath simulator. If you enjoy walking, eating, drinking and killing then this is the mod for YOU! Enjoy the thrill of walking in a straight line for hours just to be killed by a sniper, EXCITING! Imagine the tension of meeting another player as you yell "FRIENDLY" to him, just so you can empty a clip into his head and steal his chemlights.A full set of customization options adds unpredicable and HILARIOUS encounters. One moment you're driving down an empty road with your buddy, the next your dead on the ground from the invincible sniper that spawned out of the blue! THE POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS! If you arent interested in this OUTSTANDING mod I'll hunt you down and break your ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ legs......

content:
7, 2016
How I installed DayZ (with Overwatch, Epoch and Origins Mods) WIP:(Assuming you know how to get tot he root folders of ArmA 2 and ArmA 2: OA.) Load ArmA 2, then ArmA 2: OA and then DayZ (choose the 1.8.7 version underneath the  Copy and paste the ArmA 2 files (or just AddOns apparently) into ArmA 2: OA folder. Download the Overwatch mod via https://www.dropbox.com/sh/gov6ocm697esi2u/AACDG0kskKPUXvJgan3q__EWa?dl=0 and extract the @dayzoverwatch  into the ArmA 2: OA Folder Download the Epoch mod via torrents (get BitTorrent or uTorrent or something) and extract the DayZ_Epoch folder into the ArmA 2: OA Folder. Download the Origins Launcher (or alternatively get the torrent and extract the @OriginsMod into the ArmA 2: OA Folder) and install the mod. Set Launch Options in ArmA 2: OA to -mod=@Dayz -mod=@dayzoverwatch -mod=@DayZ_Epoch -mod=@OriginsMod (change accordingly and make sure that anything else goes AFTER this). Enjoy!

content:
10, 2014
												I know this seems like an awesome mod at first (which it is, at times, rarely, but the moments are still there) but after a few days of playing, you start to realize how pointless and hopeless this game is. You find some stuff, you get a weapon, you meet a person and 9 out of 10 times they shoot you on sight. I don't blame them though, cause that's just how this mod is. Everyone you see will either want to kill you or avoid you, but mostly kill you. Even the good guys. Either because they can't trust anyone they meet because they've been betrayed so many times or because you have something they want.I actually recommend this more than the standalone because the standalone is so boring, there's almost no content, it's pretty buggy and there's only one single map whereas in ArmA 2's mod, there's like 100 different maps and people have made 100 different versions of the mod like Breaking Point or DayZero, etc.If you do own ArmA 2 CO and haven't tried this yet then I suggest you do. The game is great both with friends and by yourself, because by yourself you're not drawing so much attention and you can do your own thing whereas with friends you can defend yourself much easier, you can scavenge quicker and you can have a bigger view over stuff, such as one person guarding and the other one looting.I do enjoy this mod at times though, when you just run into some super friendly person and you go on adventuers all over the map only for him to be killed and you scream "NOOO!" into the mic while spraying his killers, then crying over his corpse, sucking it up, looting him dry and throw yourself back out in the wilderness, alone and hungry, yet again.

y 8, 2014
												Warning, this game is only replayable and can offer the full experience with a group of friends. DO NOT BUY WITHOUT HAVING SOMEBODY TO PLAY WITH. This is a great experience and gives the most lifelike zombie apocolypse simulator. This game has great immersion until you find something quite common in the game, a zombie. These walking monstrosities break the game flow and any sense of immersion. The zombie combat is a mess with the ridiculous hit detection, and amount of hits with a melee weapon or with a gun. Not only the ridiculous combat is a problem but the shotty animations is a huge problem. The zombies with walk over to you, ♥♥♥♥ing flail their arms at you and you take massive damage for an attack that looked like it was done in a 4th of the time that it should. The game is terribly broken and almost all deaths are unfair leaving you in a rage state. This game may be fun to watch but sure as hell is not fun to play/

content:
5, 2014
												A really fun and challenging zombie shooter. It is completely different from any other zombie shooter I've ever played, and it can also get really competative. It's an open world map where zombies are dangerous and humans are deadly. Everything is trying to kill you, but you can either be a lone wolf, or travel in a group of friends. However, I would not recommend this game for people who are good by nature, because trying to lend out a helping hand to a fellow survivor will earn you a bullet to the face. This game is great for playing with a friend or two and going out being bandit survivors, working as a team and scavenging military bases and making one of your own. However, there aren't really many servers left and it's hard to find one that works, runs well, has good rules, and has players. 7/10.

												Getting the game to even run in the first place was far more difficult than something I'm paying money for should be, but it is a mod so I'd give it a pass due to the ease of finding the necessary information via the community. I bought this and ArmA and all its extras for $5 on a Humble Bundle sale a while back, and even though I'm sure ArmA is a fine game, I didn't buy the pack for it and I'm not interested in ever playing it--I dislike this game (DayZ) so much, I want my measley $5 back.
